mean_cn: adj. 精确的；正确的；符合标准的
mean_en: an accurate throw, shot, weapon, etc. hits or reaches the thing that it was aimed at; conforming exactly or almost exactly to fact or to a standard or performing with total accuracy
sentence: I never miss my target because my aim is so accurate.
sentence_trans: 我从未失手，因为我瞄得很准。
word_etyma: ac加强语气 + cur关心 + ate形容词词尾 → 去关注、关心，不马虎大意 → accurate准确的；精确的
